text:
Hello everyone!
I am trying to create a workflow extension and I have an error. When I try to define my extension as explained in the doc, HubSpot returns me a '404 resources not found' but I know the url is the right one and I got the right api key and the right id of my application.Can anyone help me, please, I've been looking for solutions from everywhere without success. Thank you very much for your help.
Would you please post your API code here as what you are trying to achieve? Thanks
